title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
plot: Peter Parker seeks help to reverse the fallout of his identity being revealed, with multiversal consequences.

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
plot: Teen Miles Morales meets other Spider-heroes from across the multiverse to stop a reality-threatening collider.

title: Avengers: Endgame
plot: The surviving heroes assemble on a final mission to undo Thanos' devastation.

title: Iron Man
plot: Genius inventor Tony Stark builds an armored suit to escape captivity and becomes Iron Man.

title: Black Panther
plot: T'Challa returns home to lead Wakanda while confronting a challenger to the throne.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy
plot: A band of misfits teams up to protect a mysterious orb and become unlikely heroes.

title: Dragon Ball Super: Broly
plot: Goku and Vegeta face the powerful Saiyan Broly in explosive battles.

title: Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero
plot: The heroes confront a new threat from a powerful android program.

title: The Flash
plot: Barry Allen navigates time-altering consequences in an effort to save reality.

title: The Flash (TV Series)
plot: Barry Allen fights crime and faces legacy threats while balancing life as the Scarlet Speedster.

title: Justice League
plot: Heroes unite to stop a threat that endangers the planet.

title: Wonder Woman
plot: Amazonian princess Diana leaves her island to confront the horrors of World War I.

title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
plot: Tensions rise and a clash between Batman and Superman is manipulated by darker forces.

title: The Dark Knight
plot: Batman faces the Joker, whose chaotic schemes push Gotham to the edge.

title: Inception
plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is tasked with planting an idea.

title: The Matrix
plot: A hacker discovers reality is a simulation and joins a rebellion to free humanity.

title: Interstellar
plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Back to the Future
plot: A teenager is accidentally sent back in time and must ensure his parents meet to save his future.

title: Jurassic Park
plot: Scientists clone dinosaurs for a theme park, but the experiment goes catastrophically wrong.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
plot: A hobbit begins a perilous quest to destroy a powerful ring and save Middle-earth.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
plot: Two imprisoned men form a friendship and find hope through acts of common decency.
